animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 I have soft fur and whiskers.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to fetch.
🐕 I'm a very good boy!

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat bread.
🐣 My babies are called ducklings.
🦆 I have webbed feet.

animal.question: I say 'moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat grass.
⚫ I can be black and white.
🐄 I live on a farm.

animal.question: I hop around and love carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I have long ears.
🐰 Some people keep me as a pet.
🌿 I eat leafy greens

animal.question: I'm big and grey, and I have a long trunk. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love eating peanuts.
🐘 I have big ears and tusks.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar loudly and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my neck.
🍖 I like to eat meat.
🦁 I am a big cat.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🌱 I like to eat grass.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I swim in the ocean and have a big tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am very big.
🌊 I breathe through a blowhole.
🐟 I eat small fish and krill.

animal.question: I climb trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I have a long tail I can use like a hand.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I swing from branch to branch.

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. You can ride me to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🏫 I take you to places!
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can sit inside me
🛑 I stop at bus stops

transport.question: I float on the water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move
⚓️ I can carry people or cargo
💨 Sometimes I have sails

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm bigger than a bird!
✈️ I have wings, but I'm not a bird
🌍 I can take you on vacation to another country

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry lots of people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
📢 I make a loud noise when I arrive.
💼 Many people use me to go to work.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you need to pedal to move me. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 You use your legs to move me.
🔔 I often have a bell to ring.
🛣️ You can ride me in the park or on the road.

transport.question: I am very fast and take astronauts to space. What am I?

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I help people explore.
💥 I make a loud noise when I take off.
🌌 I go very, very far away!

transport.question: I have a big container on wheels that carries things. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I can carry lots of boxes.
🚧 I am often seen on construction sites.
🛞 I'm bigger than a car.

transport.question: I fly but I don't have wings. I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🚨 You might see me helping people in an emergency.
⏫ My blades spin really fast to keep me in the air.

transport.question: I help put out fires, I am red and have a siren.

hints.text: 🔥 I help people when there is danger
🚨 I make a loud noise to warn people
💧 I carry lots of water

transport.question: I move through the water, but I'm not a boat. I go under the sea.

hints.text: 🔦 I have a light to see in the dark.
⚓️ I can explore the bottom of the ocean.
🐟 Fish swim around me.
